lines.text:
[referring to the puppy]
So, what's his name?
Trooper. Because he survived.

[Is shining with a flashlight in David's eyes, which disorientates him]
Hey, Davy. Time for a little one on one.
We're both scanners, Drak. Why help them? They're just gonna use you and throw you away, you know it, you told me!
What are you gonna do Dave, be my best friend?
[grins]
[unleashes scanner attacks on David]
We can work together, all of us. Protect each other. Put our powers to some decent use.
I like this use.
[throws David against the wall with scanner powers]
Power doesn't make you good, Dave. It just makes you powerful. And it makes me hungry. I'm gonna suck you dry, pretty boy...
How's everything?
Not good. Elaine, one of our female scanners, just died. We're losing too many, too fast. The only functional scanners we have left are Feck, Gruner and Drak.
[watching camera surveillance of Peter Drak]
I wouldn't call that functional.
He's got tremendous command of his powers. He could bounce back.
He's a psychopath. What we need is a clean scanner. A virgin mind.
[Last lines]

[is finally killing Commander John Forrester with scanner powers, suddenly stops]
No more killing. We didn't want this.
[to the press]
We mean you no harm. Just here to help.
